amendment.description: Amendment clarifies prohibited forms of payment to Iran, to include monetary instruments and precious metals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-781 to clarify prohibited forms of payment to Iran, to include monetary instruments and precious metals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Royce.
